__TOC__

* Contact: bartek kmiecie pl
* Make: Hewlett-Packard
* Brand: Pavilion
* Model: HDX 9050
* Website: http://www.shopping.hp.com/webapp/shopping/computer_can_series.do?storeName=computer_store&category=notebooks&series_name=HDX_series

=== Current Issues ===
'''VSYNC''' - ATI video card can't VSYNC; #214154

'''No sound''' - by default Surround speakers are muted, which are considered/used as primary speakers; #213554, #213577.

'''Suspend/Hibernation''' - to fix reconfigure "/etc/default/acpi-support": SAVE_VBE_STATE=false, and POST_VIDEO=true; #213581.

'''Keyboard''' - init error; #208404.

'''IR port''' - not detected; #213587.

'''LCD brightness''' - changes to 100% at system boot and on back from suspend; #213591.

'''Rear audio jacks''' - not working

'''HDTV tuner''' - not detected; #213600.

=== System Info ===
$ sudo dmidecode -s system-manufacturer

Hewlett-Packard

$ sudo dmidecode -s system-product-name

HP Pavilion HDX9000 Notebook PC

$ sudo dmidecode -s system-version

F.06

http://h10025.www1.hp.com/ewfrf/wc/manualCategory?lc=en&cc=us&lang=en&softwareitem=ob-54610-1&os=2100&product=3550150&dlc=en
